title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: ALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED AND SHIB COIN TO THE MOON?!!!!!!!!!!! + Crypto Market Analysis Todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BIHMob5RI-A

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Haha, Shib to moon dude this moon is under the Erth so I think Shib is going to die. I am damn sure about it. Dor Today's market i am sure the market was able to do much more than this and bro one more thing bottom is still not confirmed I know we are very close to it but still I am not sure about it. I am Bullish as always. So BTC to the Sun or I says its the Sun in our hands. don't be worried about its market value.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: No body is sure about the buttom of the market price now, so you are not going to say with authority or certain that price has reached down.Meanwhile you are using Shiba as reference why or you are a whale and planning to hype Shiba to moon   Shiba is going to moon when cryptocurrency bull happen but for now I will stay away.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on October 14, 2022, 10:30:09 AMALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED AND SHIB COIN TO THE MOON?!!!!!!!!!!! + Crypto Market Analysis TodayMan. Shiba was a joke of 2020. Its 2022 you know? This joke is not funny anymore. Flying spaghetti monster was also a joke and some people did not get it and after more then a decade few tens of thousands of people are Pastafarians. Don't be one of them. Shib is not a good coin to invest. Its not even a good coin to speculate on because its too manipulated.And its too soon to call "ALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED"

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: What I saw in your video is the 1D SHIB/USDT and it somewhat looks like the bottom but we will never know for sure. It's still best to risk what you can afford to lose. Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on October 15, 2022, 07:18:26 AMMan. Shiba was a joke of 2020. Its 2022 you know? This joke is not funny anymore. Flying spaghetti monster was also a joke and some people did not get it and after more then a decade few tens of thousands of people are Pastafarians. Don't be one of them. Shib is not a good coin to invest. Its not even a good coin to speculate on because its too manipulated.I think you would be happy if you speculated when it rose in price before when it hit its ATH. I just hope that those people who are speculating on it would use the correct risk adjustments for their portfolios.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on October 14, 2022, 10:30:09 AMALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED AND SHIB COIN TO THE MOON?!!!!!!!!!!! + Crypto Market Analysis Todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BIHMob5RI-AThat's the best crypto analysis I have ever read probably. It is straight to the point and not boring us with meaningless bullshit. "Alts bottomed out and shib to the moon" Everything a pro trader needs to know is packed in this sentence. First of all, it lets us know that the alts have bottomed out. Which means, almost any alt you get now will make you money. Second of all, he is informing us the best alt of all alts, shibcoin, and how it is going to moon. Hedge fund managers should hire this guy. He knows his shit.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I began to believe that all the accounts that promote Shib are either scammers or being paid, or stupid people.No one can trust a project that was launched as a joke and then tries to convince people or invite them to invest and so on.BTW, I did not click on the video link (so as not to increase views), and therefore this reply is based on those who viewed it above.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: I laugh out loud when people talk about Shiba going to the moon. I wonder what gives them the imagination to think or believe so.I believe in crypto, everybody has his or her choice of the type of coin to hype and invest in but at least don't advise people to invest in shitty altcoin like Shiba cos the coin is dead already

comments.author: firangi020
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on October 14, 2022, 10:30:09 AMALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED AND SHIB COIN TO THE MOON?!!!!!!!!!!! + Crypto Market Analysis TodayHow you can say alts just bottomed?Shib is a shitcoin. I think it pumps when the market is going to get a crush.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Errr, I don't know about that. When Shib goes to the moon it will be chaos for the whole crypto industry.It's not like I underestimate them, but I do.   I have been a supporter before but reality will strike back and that's when you will realize it's not the future of cryptocurrencies. Not Doge and not Ethereum, it's all Bitcoin. How? Altcoins pump when Bitcoin is up. It means a lot when you are monitoring price fluctuations daily. This is just another attempt to hype Shiba. Sorry, this community had been better than that.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: If Shiba is going to increase, we'll see it soon. It wasn't easy for Shiba to start increasing its price, let alone to be able to increase it several times the current price. Only time will tell, and we don't know for sure. People who say Shiba will increase are speculating about it, and with the bitcoin price still below, it's hard to say for sure that Shiba can rise again. But maybe @OP still believes Shiba can improve, just as we still believe bitcoin can increase higher. But bitcoin is different from Shiba

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 15, 2022, 09:11:37 AMI began to believe that all the accounts that promote Shib are either scammers or being paid, or stupid people.No one can trust a project that was launched as a joke and then tries to convince people or invite them to invest and so on.BTW, I did not click on the video link (so as not to increase views), and therefore this reply is based on those who viewed it above.People hype Shiba to be increasing in price but when I check the price is still not showing considerable increase as it is hype then I don't know where the profit are that it is getting the hype. Certainly it is the those that are looking to dump that are raising the air of Shiba being the golden coin.

comments.author: monineklutak
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on October 15, 2022, 10:07:47 AMI laugh out loud when people talk about Shiba going to the moon. I wonder what gives them the imagination to think or believe so.I believe in crypto, everybody has his or her choice of the type of coin to hype and invest in but at least don't advise people to invest in shitty altcoin like Shiba cos the coin is dead already It's better not to get your hopes up with meme coins and it's better to be realistic so you won't be disappointed,but indeed when someone already believes it will be difficult to tell him,Regardless, basically everyone has their own responsibility regarding their decisions

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: monineklutak on October 16, 2022, 01:08:28 PMQuote from: Marykeller on October 15, 2022, 10:07:47 AMI laugh out loud when people talk about Shiba going to the moon. I wonder what gives them the imagination to think or believe so.I believe in crypto, everybody has his or her choice of the type of coin to hype and invest in but at least don't advise people to invest in shitty altcoin like Shiba cos the coin is dead already It's better not to get your hopes up with meme coins and it's better to be realistic so you won't be disappointed,but indeed when someone already believes it will be difficult to tell him,Regardless, basically everyone has their own responsibility regarding their decisionsNot only memecoins.We for sure has to be warned that there is a recession already and the worse has yet to come. Its better not to risk anything yet because you could lose money instead because of some predictions and analysis that it has bottomed. Don't think that it will suddenly shoot to the moon if indeed altcoins had bottomed, it doesn't work that way. The prices could stay as is for a long time. It needs another big event for it to at least swing.

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: How can it be said that Shiba will go to the moon? Was it really a joke? I can hardly believe it when someone has this kind of analysis while bitcoin and other altcoins are sinking into the abyss. Given that Shiba has an unreasonable supply, of course most people would think they should buy at this point.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: There’s no bottom yet, as we stayed on this bear market longer than expected, I think the bottom price can still happen. I don’t see any reason for SHIB to hit the moon during bear market, that is just a hype for me.I understand there’s a recent update with SHIB but I think it’s not enough to pump SHIB that much. This is still a meme token after all and I know how the hype works for this project, this might be part of that.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: I want you to understand that no coins can go to the moon without bullish season, Shiba can have a little positive in market reaction during this season of bearish market, and that doesn't mean that Shiba is going to the moon, so if we enter into bullish market, you will see that many coins will be at advantages than Shiba Inu in terms of preferable altcoins to be invest on.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on October 14, 2022, 10:30:09 AMALTCOINS JUST BOTTOMED AND SHIB COIN TO THE MOON?!!!!!!!!!!! + Crypto Market Analysis Todayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BIHMob5RI-AThis analysis is not advisable to follow, the market is not at the bottom yet and there's still a possible that it can dump further.The market is very volatile, Bitcoin is still at low price and possible will retest the support level. I've heard the recent new for SHIB, I don't think the hype is there because the price didn't pump that much and that is because of the influence of Bear market. It's hard for a project to pump during this time, better not to expect that much.

comments.author: savetheFORUM
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 15, 2022, 09:11:37 AMI began to believe that all the accounts that promote Shib are either scammers or being paid, or stupid people.No one can trust a project that was launched as a joke and then tries to convince people or invite them to invest and so on.BTW, I did not click on the video link (so as not to increase views), and therefore this reply is based on those who viewed it above.You didn't add shib supporters? But I guess they will fall on the stupid people because why will they invest on a meme coin like shib when there are so many great quality coins out there. Maybe some didn't classify their selves as one but they think they are wise to drop the support once they already got their true intention. With the description laid out by the op, there is no need for us to view the link.It will only be a waste of time but I don't think a single visit can count as a views in youtube but you will need to watch the video first without skippings for your views to be counted. There might still be shib supporters in the forum who are interested to see the video.
